title: Official Signature Hashes Registry
description: Registry of officially signed executable hashes for Focus Game Deck releases. This file serves as the single source of truth for verifying the authenticity of log entries generated by official builds.

v1.0.1-alpha.description: Alpha release with enhanced log notarization and self-authentication

Focus-Game-Deck-MultiPlatform.exe.description: Multi-platform version with extended game support

notes.usage: This file is automatically updated by the Master-Build.ps1 script during production builds.
notes.verification: To verify log authenticity, compare the appSignatureHash field in Firebase log_hashes collection with the corresponding hash in this registry for the reported appVersion.
notes.security: Any log entries with appSignatureHash values not present in this registry should be considered potentially forged.
notes.development: Development builds will show 'UNSIGNED_DEVELOPMENT_BUILD' as the appSignatureHash and should not be used for production logging.
